author: Mark Wood For The Mail On Sunday
title: Could you be David Bowie's lovechild? | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share As well as claims from unknown offspring, the notice may prompt claims from former bandmates or musicians who collaborated with Bowie during his career. Bowie left nearly half of his money plus his New York apartment to his supermodel wife Iman, 61 (pictured together in 2006) Bowie left nearly half of his money plus his New York apartment to his supermodel wife Iman, 61. Most of the remaining money was divided between the couple’s daughter, Alexandria Zahra Jones, 16, and Bowie’s son with first wife Angie Bowie, filmmaker Duncan Jones, 45. Bowie died of cancer aged 69 in January last year. Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
